price: Ԑberε a (Okunu no) hunuu sε Yosef atadeε no tee wͻ akyire no, ͻkaa sε: “Nokorε sε, mo mmaa no fidi sum no mu bi nie, nokorε sε mo mmaa mofidi sum mu yε den papaapa”.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيۡدِكُنَّۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā raā qamīṣahu qudda min duburin qāla innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna ʿaẓīmun
